19  WaveletTransform::WaveletTransform(unsigned int N, enum WaveletType wt)
20  :
21  mN(N) {
22  mWork = gsl_wavelet_workspace_alloc(mN);
23  switch (wt) {
24  case Daub4:
25  mW = gsl_wavelet_alloc(gsl_wavelet_daubechies, 4);
26  break;
27  case Daub6:
28  mW = gsl_wavelet_alloc(gsl_wavelet_daubechies, 6);
29  break;
30  case Daub8:
31  mW = gsl_wavelet_alloc(gsl_wavelet_daubechies, 8);
32  break;
33  case Daub10:
34  mW = gsl_wavelet_alloc(gsl_wavelet_daubechies, 10);
35  break;
36  case Daub12:
37  mW = gsl_wavelet_alloc(gsl_wavelet_daubechies, 12);
38  break;
39  case Daub14:
40  mW = gsl_wavelet_alloc(gsl_wavelet_daubechies, 14);
41  break;
42  case Daub16:
43  mW = gsl_wavelet_alloc(gsl_wavelet_daubechies, 16);
44  break;
45  case Daub18:
46  mW = gsl_wavelet_alloc(gsl_wavelet_daubechies, 18);
47  break;
48  case Daub20:
49  mW = gsl_wavelet_alloc(gsl_wavelet_daubechies, 20);
50  break;
51  case DaubC4:
52  mW = gsl_wavelet_alloc(gsl_wavelet_daubechies_centered, 4);
53  break;
54  case DaubC6:
55  mW = gsl_wavelet_alloc(gsl_wavelet_daubechies_centered, 6);
56  break;
57  case DaubC8:
58  mW = gsl_wavelet_alloc(gsl_wavelet_daubechies_centered, 8);
59  break;
60  case DaubC10:
61  mW = gsl_wavelet_alloc(gsl_wavelet_daubechies_centered, 10);
62  break;
63  case DaubC12:
64  mW = gsl_wavelet_alloc(gsl_wavelet_daubechies_centered, 12);
65  break;
66  case DaubC14:
67  mW = gsl_wavelet_alloc(gsl_wavelet_daubechies_centered, 14);
68  break;
69  case DaubC16:
70  mW = gsl_wavelet_alloc(gsl_wavelet_daubechies_centered, 16);
71  break;
72  case DaubC18:
73  mW = gsl_wavelet_alloc(gsl_wavelet_daubechies_centered, 18);
74  break;
75  case DaubC20:
76  mW = gsl_wavelet_alloc(gsl_wavelet_daubechies_centered, 20);
77  break;
78 
79  case Bspline103:
80  mW = gsl_wavelet_alloc(gsl_wavelet_bspline, 103);
81  break;
82  case Bspline105:
83  mW = gsl_wavelet_alloc(gsl_wavelet_bspline, 105);
84  break;
85  case Bspline202:
86  mW = gsl_wavelet_alloc(gsl_wavelet_bspline, 202);

96  break;

102  break;

104  mW = gsl_wavelet_alloc(gsl_wavelet_bspline, 305);
105  break;

107  mW = gsl_wavelet_alloc(gsl_wavelet_bspline, 307);
108  break;

110  mW = gsl_wavelet_alloc(gsl_wavelet_bspline, 309);
111  break;
112  case BsplineC103:
113  mW = gsl_wavelet_alloc(gsl_wavelet_bspline_centered, 103);
114  break;
115  case BsplineC105:
116  mW = gsl_wavelet_alloc(gsl_wavelet_bspline_centered, 105);
117  break;
118  case BsplineC202:
119  mW = gsl_wavelet_alloc(gsl_wavelet_bspline_centered, 202);
120  break;
121  case BsplineC204:
122  mW = gsl_wavelet_alloc(gsl_wavelet_bspline_centered, 204);
123  break;
124  case BsplineC206:
125  mW = gsl_wavelet_alloc(gsl_wavelet_bspline_centered, 206);
126  break;
127  case BsplineC208:
128  mW = gsl_wavelet_alloc(gsl_wavelet_bspline_centered, 208);
129  break;
130  case BsplineC301:
131  mW = gsl_wavelet_alloc(gsl_wavelet_bspline_centered, 301);
132  break;
133  case BsplineC303:
134  mW = gsl_wavelet_alloc(gsl_wavelet_bspline_centered, 303);
135  break;
136  case BsplineC305:
137  mW = gsl_wavelet_alloc(gsl_wavelet_bspline_centered, 305);
138  break;
139  case BsplineC307:
140  mW = gsl_wavelet_alloc(gsl_wavelet_bspline_centered, 307);
141  break;
142  case BsplineC309:
143  mW = gsl_wavelet_alloc(gsl_wavelet_bspline_centered, 309);
144  break;
145  case HaarC:
146  mW = gsl_wavelet_alloc(gsl_wavelet_haar_centered, 2);
147  break;
148  default:
149  mW = gsl_wavelet_alloc(gsl_wavelet_haar, 2);
150  break;
151  }
152 
153  }
157 
158  WaveletTransform::~WaveletTransform() {
159  gsl_wavelet_free(mW);
160  gsl_wavelet_workspace_free(mWork);
161  }
162 
163  void WaveletTransform::Forward(SeqViewDouble& In) {
164  Dmatrix * in = In.GetData();
165  WaveletTransform::Forward(*in);
166  }
167 
168  void WaveletTransform::Inverse(SeqViewDouble& In) {
169  Dmatrix * in = In.GetData();
170  WaveletTransform::Inverse(*in);
171  }
172 
173  void WaveletTransform::Forward(Dmatrix& In) {
174  if (In.size1() != 1) {
175  LogWarning("WaveletTransform: multichannel yet not implemented. Working on first channel");
176  }
177  if (In.size2() != mN) {
178  mN = In.size2();
179  LogWarning("WaveletTransform: the size of input data is different from the size of the working space. Resizing it");
180  mWork = gsl_wavelet_workspace_alloc(In.size2());
181  }
182  double *data = new double[ mN ];
183  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < mN; i++) {
184  data[ i ] = In(0, i);
185  }
186 
187  gsl_wavelet_transform_forward(mW, data, 1, mN, mWork);
188  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < mN; i++) {
189  In(0, i) = data[ i ];
190  }
191  delete[] data;
192  }
193 
194  void WaveletTransform::Inverse(Dmatrix& In) {
195 
196  if (In.size1() != 1) {
197  LogWarning("WaveletTransform: multichannel yet not implemented. Working on first channel");
198  }
199  if (In.size2() != mN) {
200  mN = In.size2();
201  LogWarning("WaveletTransform: the size of input data is different from the size of the working space. Resizing it");
202  mWork = gsl_wavelet_workspace_alloc(In.size2());
203  }
204  double* data = new double[ mN ];
205  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < mN; i++) {
206  data[ i ] = In(0, i);
207  }
208 
209  gsl_wavelet_transform_inverse(mW, data, 1, mN, mWork);
210  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < mN; i++) {
211  In(0, i) = data[ i ];
212  }
213  delete[] data;
214  }

239  void WaveletTransform::WaveletPrint() {
240  size_t n = mW->nc;
241  size_t i;
242 
243  printf("Wavelet type: %s\n", mW->type->name);
244 
245  printf
246  (" h1(%d):%12.8f g1(%d):%12.8f h2(%d):%12.8f g2(%d):%12.8f\n",
247  0, mW->h1[ 0 ], 0, mW->g1[ 0 ], 0, mW->h2[ 0 ], 0, mW->g2[ 0 ]);
248 
249  for (i = 1; i < (n < 10 ? n : 10); i++) {
250  printf
251  (" h1(%d):%12.8f g1(%d):%12.8f h2(%d):%12.8f g2(%d):%12.8f\n",
252  i, mW->h1[ i ], i, mW->g1[ i ], i, mW->h2[ i ], i, mW->g2[ i ]);
253  }
254 
255  for (; i < n; i++) {
256  printf
257  ("h1(%d):%12.8f g1(%d):%12.8f h2(%d):%12.8f g2(%d):%12.8f\n",
258  i, mW->h1[ i ], i, mW->g1[ i ], i, mW->h2[ i ], i, mW->g2[ i ]);
259  }
260  }
261 
262  void WaveletTransform::WaveletWaveform(Dvector& V) {
263  double* data = new double[ mN ];
264  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < mN; i++) {
265  data[ i ] = 0.0;
266  }
267 
268  data[ 22 ] = 1.0;
269  gsl_wavelet_transform_inverse(mW, data, 1, mN, mWork);
270  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < mN; i++) {
271  V(i) = data[ i ];
272  }
273  delete data;
274  }
275 
276 }
